page.title: 14The Village Policeman
page.content: The resident village policeman is P.C. Whitehead.He is the only policeman in the winter.In the summer there are 2 on duty and sometimes 3.The reason is because there are more crimes in summer when there are over 7,500 extra people on 65 caravan sites.On Bank Holidays there is a patrol van half way down Sea Lane.In it are a sergeant and 10 men in case there is any fighting.Usually we get families but sometimes we get skin-heads or gangs. P.C.Whitehead works along with Butlin's Security Officers and the Beach Inspectors.In summer he goes round the market looking for pick- pockets and round the arcades for people fiddling machines.At night he deals with drunks and fights near pubs and night-clubs.He also searches for lost children and property.In winter the most common crime is theft.
